parameters: 背景車内02
背景山道出口
立ち男達02
立ち援軍
立ち援軍02
立ち総長
立ち大男
立ち筋肉男
背景車内01
立ちマネ(イベント)
立ち音々(イベント)
立ちサワ(イベント)
立ちモモ(イベント)
立ちキノ(服)
立ちモモ(服)
背景車内02

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(I had a feeling when that siren went off...
Shit... This is bad, how do we get through this?)

Immediately after passing through the mountain
road, we were forced to stop by two cars that were
waiting and provoking us.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Sawa, how are the police officers?
\n<Sawa>Yes, I told them to come right away... Ah...

\n<Kino>Tch... It seems like those guys aren't just
waiting leisurely.

Kino, who was made to get in the car for her own
safety, leaned out of the back seat and pointed
forward.

Men are coming out one after another from the car
parked ahead.

\n<Kino>What should we do? If we stay holed up like this,
we'll definitely get caught. It seems like those
guys are skilled in this kind of 'rough business'.

Kino must have felt that way after seeing how
skillfully those guys forced us to stop... On that
point, I agree as well.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(If that's the case... Should we just get out of
the car and run away? If I stay behind, I can hold
some of them back...)

\n<Kino>...If we're going to do it, I'll go along. This
happened because of my mistake... This happened
because of my mistake...
It seems like Kino was thinking the same thing.
\n<Sawa>N-No... That's... absolutely not allowed!
\n<Minato Neon>「.........」
\n<Sonoda Kohei>...Neon?

Minato Neon was staring at me intently... with a
troubled expression and a smile.
\n<Minato Neon>...I guess there's no other choice.

Minato Neon unlocks the door on the passenger
side.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>H-Hey! What are you doing--...

\n<Minato Neon>Udo's target is me, right? In that case... I'll go
out and try to settle things somehow...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Don't say something stupid! Do you really think we
would be happy about that?!

\n<Minato Neon>...You'll probably get angry. But it's better than
involving important comrades.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Ah, I see... So you're that kind of person.
I grip the steering wheel again.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Neon... If you were to leave, I wouldn't hesitate
to run over those guys with this car.
\n<Minato Neon>Ngh...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>It's better to sacrifice you. I'll get caught as a
criminal... but you guys will definitely be saved.
\n<Kino>Hehe, well that's fine♪ I'll go along with it♪

\n<Sawa>Wait... Let's calm down for a moment... Hey, Momo,
can you say something too?

Momo, who had been silently looking outside the
car, speaks up.
\n<Momo>...Hey, hey, don't you hear something?
\n<Sawa>Huh...? What do you mean you hear something...?
\n<Minato Neon>...Ah... It's true... this is...
\n<Kino>----...!! Can you please turn off the engine!
\n<Sonoda Kohei>W-What the hell...

I was hesitant to turn off the engine, but I
reluctantly did as they said... And then, I
clearly heard it too.

\n<Sawa>W-What... Could it be that they called for
reinforcements...?
\n<Kino>It's the opposite... Geez, making us wait...
\n<Men>Huh? What's with the annoyance...
\n<Men>H-Hey... Won't you come over here?
\n<Men>No way... It's just a coincidence, right?
\n<Men>No... We're almost there...

The men turned around... and we also caught sight
of it in our field of vision. Turning around the
corner ahead, a group of motorcycles came rushing
towards us like a muddy stream...

\n<Men>Oh, could it be that those guys are the same as
us...

\n<Men>Ah, I see... Tch, are they trying to steal the
credit?

A group of men, one after another, mounted their
motorcycles on the other side. Among them, several
dozen men who were leading the group got off their
bikes and slowly walked towards us.

I understood at a glance. Those men are completely
different from the thugs who were cornering us.

Each person exuded an \r[air of indulging in
violence on a daily basis... They all carried such
a precarious atmosphere around them.
\n<Men>H-Hey... Maybe they're different after all?

\n<Men>Ah... Ahh! I... I have a promise with a girl! So,
I'm fine... You guys can take the credit!
\n<Men>Ah! H-Hey...

The men who couldn't hide their agitation, one by
one... slipped through the side of the tough-
looking men and fled.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>C-Could it be... are they old acquaintances?

Kino, however, showed a puzzled expression and
shook her head.

\n<Kino>What are those guys... I'll go check them out for
a bit.

Kino, who said that, without hesitation, stepped
out of the car and approached the men. I hurriedly
followed after her.
\n<Kino>Who the hell are you guys... where are you from?

Unfortunately, I hide in Kino's shadow and observe
the situation.
\n<？？？>...Doki na

With that voice, the group in front of me split in
half, and from the center, a woman approached.

\n<？？？>Geez... If you're so nervous that you can't speak
in front of the real thing, then you shouldn't be
leading the way.
\n<Stern Man>S-Sorry...
\n<Kino>Y-You...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>W-What?! Are they enemies? Are they enemies?!
I-I'll do it too if I have to!

While hiding in Kino's shadow, I warm up with some
sharp shadow boxing in my mind.

\n<？？？>Long time no see. Looks like you haven't changed a
bit, reckless Kino...

\n<Kino>You've really changed, \r[ Minato, Madoka. You've
completely taken on the face of a mother.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(Are they an ally? They're an ally, right?
Alright...)
I stand beside Kino.

\n<Kino>Ah, don't worry Sonoda-san... This is an old
acquaintance, Minato Madoka. And this is our
manager, Sonoda-san.

\n<Enka>Nice to meet you, I'm Enka. Kino is always taking
care of me.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>U-Um, this is Sonoda. Today is a good day...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(An arranged marriage?! N-No, but more
importantly... They seem like a decent person. I
apologize for being on guard just because they're
an acquaintance of Kino...)

\n<Kino>So... who are those people? I don't recognize any
of their faces...
\n<Enka>Ah... Those are my husband's junior colleagues.

\n<Stern Man>Hey, hey, Enka-san! That's a bit much! Please
introduce them properly!

\n<Enka>You're so noisy... Well, if I start talking, it'll
get long...

\n<Enka>After I received a message from Kino, I tried to
contact my former colleagues, but it was late at
night... and I couldn't reach them.

\n<Enka>So when I told my husband about it, he gathered
people for me...

\n<Kino>Ah, my husband was also a former delinquent... But
it's surprising that they all gathered like
this...

Certainly... When I looked around, there were
about 50 or 60 people, including those who were
straddling motorcycles.

\n<Enka>Well, rather than my husband's influence... it
might be because of your power. Somehow, the word
got out that I might be able to meet AlterGuns...
\n<Kino>What... are you here for Neon?
\n<Stern Man A>I'm a Kino fan! Kino is the only one who can win!

\n<Stern Man B>Ah! You...! I've been a fan since the days of
'Fireball Kino'!
\n<Kino>Huh!?
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Fireball...? What's that?
\n<Kino>N-Nothing! It's fine here, so go back to the car.
\n<Momo>Tell me more.
\n<Kino>What the hell, they're all gathering up!!

\n<Enka>That... I wonder if it was during the conflict
between us, the 'Extreme Evil Butterfly' and \r[
Jirai Gen?

\n<Enka>Someone described Kino, who was dressed in a
crimson \r[ costume, running straight towards the
enemy, as a 'fireball' for the first time.

\n<Stern Man C>So the legend of the 'Fireball' started from that
day...
\n<Kino>Uwaaaahhhhh!!!

\n<Minato Neon>Calm down, Kino! You look cool as a fireball,
don't you? In English, it would be 'Fireball'...
*laughs*

Minato Neon, who showed a self-destructive follow-
up, was the first to cause laughter in various
places.
\n<Kino>Y-You guys!!

\n<Enka>Then let's join the main unit. We just need to
escort them outside of town, right?

\n<Kino>Ah...hmm? The main unit? Are there others besides
us?
\n<Enka>Hey, you... Don't underestimate our influence.

\n<Enka>Despite it being late at night, everyone
gathered... a total of 300 people! It was quite a
challenge to organize them, you know.

\n<Kino>I see, so that's why we were late... with 300
people...

I felt amazed... not just because of the number
300, but because I have a friend like Enka. She
acted purely for Kino's sake and rushed to help. I
wonder... do I have even one friend like that...
\n<Kino>I've ended up with a huge debt... Thanks, Enka.

\n<Enka>Don't be conceited, who do you think would come
running for your sake! Of course I came to see
Minato-sama!
\n<Sonoda Kohei>(Ah, ah...)
\n<Kino>Uwaaahhhhh!!

Kino covers their face with both hands and
crouches down in that spot.

\n<Enka>Neon-sama! Please give me your autograph! Ah, if
you could write it as 'Enka', it would make things
\r[ much easier!
\n<Minato Neon>Ah, ah... Is that okay...?

\n<Enka>No problem. That child... is the type who enjoys
being bullied, you know...
\n<Kino>Th-th-there's no way that's true!
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Shall we go back to the car?

\n<Sawa>Hehe, that's right. Let's go back... Huh? I can't
find Momo...
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Huh!? She was just there a moment ago...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(Ah, there you are! What are you doing in such a
distant place...)
\n<Stern Big Man>「.........」
\n<Stern Big Man>U-um...
\n<Momo>You're big~ How old are you?
\n<Stern Big Man>Eh... I-I'm 17!

\n<Momo>Ahaha, it's not about age~ It's about height,
silly~

Momo vigorously slaps the back of the stern big
man.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(Hey... It's not appropriate to casually touch
someone of that age...)
\n<Stern Big Man>Wha-what!? I-I'm 195!
\n<Sonoda Kohei>(Ah... Poor thing... I was too late...)

\n<Momo>Whoa~ It's almost 2 meters! Alright then, here you
go!

Momo turned her back to the big man and stretched
out her arms to the sides.
\n<Stern Big Man>Eh... W-what is it?

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(Well, that's confusing... What is that person
doing?)
\n<Momo>High, high~ Give it a try~
\n<Stern Big Man>Huh... Huh? Huh!?
\n<Momo>Hey~ Come on, hurry up and do it \I[12].
\n<Sonoda Kohei>(......S-Something feels lewd)
\n<Stern Big Man>Uh... E-excuse me...

The big man wiped his palms with his own clothes
and then suddenly lifted up the offering that was
next to Momo.
\n<Momo>Whoa~ Amazing! So this is the view from 2 meters~
\n<Stern Big Man>Haha, is that so...huh?

The big man turned around and saw the men who had
escaped earlier in the square facing the road.
\n<The returning men>Ah! It's them!

\n<Muscular man>Oh... You're not an amateur, huh! Looks like this
is going to be fun!

Leading the way was a muscular man, followed by
the men who had escaped earlier. Behind them,
there were dozens of other men.
\n<Stern Big Man>...Momo-san, please go. We will take care of this.

The big man gently set Momo down and turned his
face towards me.

\n<Stern Big Man>Hey! You're the manager, right? It's dangerous
here, so take Momo-san and go!
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Momo! Come here, get in the car!
\n<Momo>Eh... U-um... But...

\n<Stern Big Man>No problem, I've got it under control. Go on...
I'll be cheering for you the whole time!

\n<Momo>Thank you... Watch me, okay! I'll do my best, Momo
will give it her all~!

Momo and I got into the car. Neon had moved to the
back seat and was being embraced by Sawa.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>...Neon, are you okay?
\n<Minato Neon>Haha... I can't seem to stop trembling...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(It's not surprising... If a group of men like
that were coming to capture me, even as a man, I
would be trembling...)
\n<Enka>We'll lead the way! Don't fall behind, Kino!

\n<Kino>Huh, who are you talking to? Did you give birth to
a child and lose your mind?
\n<Enka>Huh? Geez... You still have a foul mouth, huh?

Perhaps it is their usual exchange, but their
normalcy in this situation is quite reassuring.
That's why even someone like me, a commoner, can
somehow maintain composure.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(......Don't worry, we will return safely.
Because...)

Sawa reached out her hand to me, who was alone,
and supported me all along. Momo gave us weapons
to fight against the great evil, while we were
defenseless. And Kino... Kino overcame fear and
despair with absolute strength.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(It's a lie that we won't be saved after coming
this far. Such an ending should only exist in
stories.)
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Alright... Let's go!

If even one person was missing... it wouldn't have
turned out like this. And this is not a miracle...
it is the result of the bonds we, me and them,
have woven together, the accomplishment of human
\r[.

We... we finally made it to the place we almost
lost----...
A
背景交差点
背景車内02
背景コンビニ
背景車内01
立ち総長
立ちモモ(服)
立ちキノ(服)
立ち音々ライダースーツ05
立ち三人04
立ち音々ライダースーツ03
立ち音々ライダースーツ04
立ち音々ライダースーツ02
立ち音々ライダースーツ01
立ち警察官

\n<Police Officer A>W-Wait... I didn't hear anything like this...
H-Hey! What should we do?!
\n<Police Officer B>What are we supposed to do... This is hopeless...

\n<Police Officer A>Then... I'll, I'll report it for now! I'll inform
Udo-san right away--...

\n<Police Officer B>That... it hasn't been connecting at all since
earlier... Damn it! What the hell is going on...

\n<Police Officer A>Haha... This isn't good. It seems like we should
pack our things tonight...

And... the police officers stood there in shock,
silently watching the muddy stream flowing down
the main street...

It was a breathtaking sight. Countless motorcycles
surrounded the car we were in and were running
alongside us.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Haha... I feel like I've become an important
person being escorted by a convoy...

\n<Minato Neon>Is that so? With all this commotion, it feels less
like protection and more like a little parade,
doesn't it?

\n<Momo>That's right! Somehow, I'm getting all...
excited~!

\n<Sawa>Just because of that, don't stick your head out of
the window! I'm not a child, you know!

I understand the feeling... In fact, I'm also
getting excited, just like \r[ said.
\n<Minato Neon>It's over... Really...

Her trembling had stopped. Seeing that, there was
relief, but at the same time... a slight sense of
regret remained.

I couldn't even comfort her, who was frightened.
We were able to come this far, mostly thanks to
Sawa and the other two.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>(I'm... really useless, aren't I...)

Soon, we will pass through the main street. Once I
safely deliver her... I will think about what to
do with my life.

I... no, I exposed them to danger. I have to take
responsibility for that.

I... I should leave from in front of them. From
the beginning, I was lacking in strength... I had
a faint feeling about it. If it wasn't me... by
now, they would have been shining even more----...

\n<Enka>We've come this far, so I think we'll be fine.
It's about time for us to take our leave.

After each of them expressed their gratitude to
Enka-san... Kino took a step forward.

\n<Kino>It was good to be able to run with you again after
a long time. And... I really appreciate your help.

\n<Enka>Why don't you show your face in your hometown once
in a while? Everyone is eagerly anticipating and
cheering for your success, you know.
\n<Kino>Yeah... Ah, let's do that.

Enka-san mounted the motorcycle with a swift
motion, waved at us once, and then revved the
engine, racing away with a loud noise. The men
followed suit and once again formed a turbulent
stream.
\n<Momo>Ah... Manen-chan! Look over there!

Momo looked to where she was pointing, and saw
that intimidating big man and his companions
running away proudly, raising their arms.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>...They were a pleasant bunch.
\n<Kino>Ah, yeah...

Kino showed a rare lonely expression. However...
it was only for a moment, and quickly returned to
the usual Kino, turning towards me.

\n<Kino>I want to talk with the four of us for a moment.
Sorry, but Sonoda-san, could you step aside for a
bit...
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Huh... Ah, yeah... Then I'll wait in the car.

I somehow sensed it. They are probably going to
confess their sins to Neon.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>It'll be alright... This isn't the end, right?

However... it is Neon who will decide that. No
matter what answer she gives, we have no right to
blame her.

I knew that, but I couldn't help but be curious,
so I peeked at their behavior outside the window.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>...huh...

Minato Neon... was sitting alone, looking down. It
was too dark to see her expression clearly, but
she seemed to be crying.

It might have been a cruel truth for her, who was
exhausted both mentally and physically. Should we
have measured the timing to confess with more
consideration for her?

No... It's not for me to meddle in. Even those
three understand that. It's probably a decision
they made, thinking it's time to confess now.

I might have been naive. Simply sending them back
to their everyday lives won't solve anything. They
are individuals with their own thoughts, and they
will continue to live on in the future...

I can only wait helplessly... and it's pathetic.
That's why I pray. Even if we can no longer
continue our activities together as we have been,
please, I hope that the relationship between the
four of them will not be broken...
I could only wish for it like a child...

Since they walked over here, I stepped out of the
car.

\n<Minato Neon>Sonoda-san... I won't give up. I can't just give
up on this...

Minato Neon said only that and then... she
straddled the motorcycle.

\n<Kino>...Sorry, but from here on, I'll be going my own
way.

\n<Momo>Mane-chan, please go home with Minato Neon and
Nene-chan.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Huh... What do you mean by that?

...I couldn't find the words. I couldn't ask any
further. It felt unfair to hear the details
without Minato Neon, who was waiting alone in a
distant place...
\n<Sawa>I'm counting on you, Neon.
The three of them got into the car.

\n<Kino>There should be a helmet in the trunk. Take it
with you.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Ah, ah...

\n<Sawa>Well then, we'll go ahead... Since it'll be a two-
seater, be careful driving, okay?
\n<Minato Neon>Ah, I understand. Sawa and the others too...
\n<Momo>Well then, see you~...

And so... leaving me and Neon behind, Sawa and the
others also left.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>...Should we change the time? I'll go buy
something.

\n<Minato Neon>Ah, ah... Yeah, I understand. I'll leave it to
you.

\n<Minato Neon>...I'm sorry for not saying anything, but what is
this...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Refreshing and exhilarating! Is it carbonated
cocoa?

\n<Minato Neon>So don't try to test it on me! Exchange it with
that one!

\n<Sonoda Kohei>It's not a big deal... but this one is shisomeron
tea, you know?

\n<Minato Neon>More shisomeron tea! What is it? Do you like it?
Are you secretly addicted to it?!

\n<Sonoda Kohei>No, I was thinking of cutting off Neon's
retreat...
\n<Minato Neon>If we both die... I'll lose my friends too...

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Ah, I'll only do it with Neon, so it's not a
problem.
\n<Minato Neon>~~~~~~~
\n<Minato Neon>Mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm, mmm...

Minato Neon, who became desperate, quickly gulped
down the mysterious... I mean, the highly
anticipated new product.
\n<Minato Neon>Puhah... Huh? This is actually pretty good...
\n<Sonoda Kohei>You're kidding... That's just stupid...

\n<Minato Neon>Well then, it's Sonoda-san's turn. Come on, take a
sip♪
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Hmph..........

\n<Minato Neon>Even if you make such a serious face, I won't
forgive you. Come on, hurry up and take a sip.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Ngh... Guh...
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Ohh...

......The unpleasant sweetness lingering in my
mouth is quite nauseating. Nevertheless, I want to
commend myself for managing to drink it all
without leaving any behind. And now, I turn
towards Neon and throw the empty bottle into the
trash can.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Well then, Neon, shall we go soon?
\n<Minato Neon>Huh?!

Minato Neon, who was playing with her smartphone a
little away from me, let out a small moan.
\n<Minato Neon>Ahem... Ah, wait a moment.

I thought it was suspicious... but I decided to
stop pursuing it because it could lead to sexual
harassment... What a troublesome world we live in.
\n<Minato Neon>...Hyauu!? D-Don't touch my side!

\n<Minato Neon>I'll rely on the grab bar (※) or your shoulder...
※A handlebar attached along the back seat.
\n<Sonoda Kohei>Ah, ah...

Riding on the tandem seat was my first experience,
so I was nervous. However... there was another
reason for my nervousness.

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Just to make sure... Are you okay? Have you ever
ridden tandem before?
\n<Minato Neon>What? Are you doubting my driving skills?

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Yeah, well... I've had some pretty spectacular
falls in the past...
\n<Minato Neon>Ah, it's different from back then! Leave it to me!

She... has a previous record of bleeding from her
head and coming to work. I'm sorry, but I just
can't trust Neon. And besides...
\n<Minato Neon>Alright! Let's go! Hold on tight!

\n<Sonoda Kohei>(He's definitely influenced by those guys
earlier... His cheerful attitude just seems fake
to me now...)

\n<Sonoda Kohei>Father, mother... Please forgive me for leaving
you behind...
\n<Minato Neon>Hehe... Stop it, don't make me laugh.
A
A
